comment: This guy is terrible. Choose an alternative class for your concentration or wait another semester. Dude will take off 60 whole points off assignments without giving feedback. He will give you 40 links and expect you to have memorized info. Probably the worst professor at KSU, and I had a good amount of bad ones (trust me). This is your sign!!!!!!!!

Very unorganized and just completely apathetic about whether anyone is learning anything. You'll basically just be teaching yourself through google and vendor documentation. He doesn't respond timely to emails or posts from students with questions, and when he does he is flippant and condescending. He does know the subject, but not how to teach.

Very crazy professor. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS WITH THIS PROFESSOR. He doesn't explain anything , he just gives material. He doesn't care about the student. He has a thick accent and cant speak English fluently. No second chance for assignment, professor should be on the field working not teaching. he doesn't care about the success of the students.

This professor is from India with a thick accent, he doesn't teach at all. He gives material for you to practice on your own. Professor does NOT care about the success of the student. In-fact he wants to fail every on in his class. Assignment are no second chance,. This professor is not suppose to be teaching . he is suppose to be on the field work

Some assigns had gram errors confusing the class. Doesn't respond fast enough for an online class. Labs had some handson but I still felt clueless. Not enough hands on for me. 50/50 of class grade is assigns/test 1 & 2. Follow instructions with format.2 much reading. Change screenshot capture in term/cmd to jpg to save time. Gives some xtracredit
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Tough grader

comment: If you have the option to use a different prof for this class, take the other option. He is so unhelpful, his grading criteria is unclear and then he takes off points if you miss something he was unclear on. I had to hire a tutor and no matter how much I demonstrated that I wanted to do well in his class, he did not care. Worst professor ever.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Tough grader

comment: Do not take this professor unless you are hardcore ready to take some BS or have points taken off for submitting extra screenshots when submitting your lab assignments. Especially being a online class and I've taken online classes before, no professor takes credits off for submitting extra work. Very tough Professor . Do not take.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Class is all SQL, which is great but the professor has 40-50 page modules with the Lab at the end. They are done through a copy-paste method so keeping it clean is a bit difficult. Seems like every time we submit an assignment he makes a class post about what we missed and how we didn't read the question correctly.
